name: Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite
description: Cost-efficient 2.0 model with same speed and cost as 1.5 Flash but improved quality. Optimized for low-latency, high-volume applications.
notes: Public preview. Same 1M token context as 2.0 Flash. Ideal for cost-sensitive applications requiring good performance. Successor to 1.5 Flash pricing model.
